title: Misrepresentation of quantity
context: ยง486-121 Misrepresentation of quantity. No person shall: (1) Sell, offer, or expose for sale less than the quantity represented; (2) Take any more than the quantity represented when the buyer furnishes the weight or measure by means of which the quantity is determined; or (3) Represent the quantity in any manner calculated to mislead or in any way deceive another person. [L 1991, c 153, pt of ยง6; am L 1993, c 54, ยง12]
